name: Sendcard
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Sendcard is a multi-database (It currently supports 9 different databases!) ecards script or virtual postcard program written in PHP. Suitable for large or small sites, it is very easy to setup, and comes with an installation wizard.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:]+alt="Powered by sendcard - an advanced PHP e-card program"[^>]*><\/a>)
(?-mix:]+alt="Powered by sendcard - an advanced PHP e-card program">)

matches.text: <!-- The following line should allow me to search on google and find sendcard installations -->
